message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $18,000. I'm confident this is a fair reflection of its worth.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  That starting price is a bit high for me. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for the product.
Hi Bob, thanks for your response. I understand your perspective, but $10,000 undervalues the product significantly.  To be fair to both of us, I could consider $16,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you moving a bit on the price. I can see this going to $11,000, but that's really my limit.
